properties.name: Afghan Kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 35, Islington Green, N1 8DU, London, EnglandIn the heart of Islington - an inexpensive, and utterly divine, vegetarian friendly place - reservations a must!

properties.name: Favela Chic
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag    91 Great Eastern Street, EC2, LondonFab Braslian bar/restaurant/dance venue in Shoreditch which has the feel of the best house party you\'ve ever been to. Friendly crowd and staff makes this an essential destination. Make sure you get in by 9 otherwise becomes impossible to get in. Also having a dinner booking can help.

properties.name: Moro restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 34 Exmouth Market, EC1R 4QE, London EnglandLovely North African/Moorish restaurant - reservations a must!

properties.name: Old (Vieux) Montreal
properties.description: Posted by LydiagOld Montreal, CanadaThe oldest part of the city - lovely area to walk around in and discover

properties.name: Parc du Mont Royal
properties.description: Posted by LydiagParc du Mont-Royal, H3H 1A2, Montreal, CanadaFabulous views of all of Montreal

properties.name: Saki Restaurant Bar and Fod Emporium
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 4 West Smithfield, EC1, London, EnglandLovely japanese restaurant in the heart of Smithfields

properties.name: Schwartz's World Famous Smoke Meat
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 3895 St. Laurent, H2W 1X9, Montreal, CanadaNot to be missed! Order their famous smoked meat sandwich on rye (with pickle on the side). Worth the wait (always a line out the door!)

properties.name: Smith of Smithfields
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 61 Charterhouse Street, EC1M 6HJ, London, EnglandSituated in an ex-meat storage unit in Smithfields wholesale meat market - Smiths offers four floors of food and drink - the ground floor being my favourite, especially for a hearty weekend brunch - try their enormous waffles or pancakes - the meat is , of course top quality!

properties.name: Song Que restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 134g Kingsland Road, E2 8DY, London, EnglandAn inexpensive Vietnamese restaurant in Shoreditch - very friendly service.

properties.name: St John Bar and Restaurant SMithfield
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 26 St John Street, EC1M 4AY, London, EnglandNot for the squeemish or vegetarian - trendy smithfield restaurant by the celebrated British chef Fergus Henderson - favourite dish on menu: roast marrow bone

properties.name: St Laurent Boulevard nightlife
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag  St Laurent Boulevard, Montreal CanadaGreat street (north of Sherbrooke) to hang out on in the evening, with lots of bars, restaurants and clubs. See link for details

properties.name: St. Viateur Bagel shop
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag  263 St. Viateur West, H2V 1Y1, Montreal, CanadaCheck out this description of the famous Montreal bagel: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Montreal_bagel Some people even have them sent across the world. Worth the detour to either the shop or the cafe. Trust me on this

properties.name: The Providores and Tapa Room
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag 108 Marylebone High Street, W1U 4RX, London, EnglandVery Sex and the City brunch location in Marylebone high st - Peter Gordon\'s new outpost - serving Monmouth Coffee Co coffee. Turns into a tapas restaurant the rest of the day. Downstairs is more informal than the restaurant upstairs

properties.name: Vertigo 42
properties.description: Posted by Lydiag25, Old Broad St, London, EC2N 1HTBar with the best panaramic view over London - located in the NatWest building at Liverpool St - reservations essential - ask for Bankside view
